trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Gets the control pattern implementation for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The type of pattern implemented by the element to retrieve.
The object that implements the pattern interface, or `null` if the specified pattern interface is not implemented by this peer.
Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.
Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
The number of columns spanned.
Gets a UI Automation provider that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider"></xref> and represents the container of the cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
A UI Automation provider that represents the cell or item container.
Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the row containing the cell or item.
Gets the number of rows spanned by a cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
The number of rows spanned.
Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
`true` if the element is selected; otherwise, `false`.
Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Clears any selected items and then selects the current element.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Gets the UI Automation provider that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider"></xref> and acts as the container for the calling object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
The provider that acts as the container for the calling object.
Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers that represents all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableItemProvider> interface.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers that represents all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableItemProvider> interface.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
Makes the virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DateTimeAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> interface.
